00030 RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::npConnectionResponse()
00031   :NetPacketBase(NPI_SVR_CONRESP){
00032 
00033   data=new npConnectionResponseData();
00034   response=NCR_UNDEFINED;
00035 }

00042 RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::npConnectionResponse(tServerConnectionResponse t)
00043   :NetPacketBase(NPI_SVR_CONRESP){
00044 
00045   data=new npConnectionResponseData();
00046   response=t;
00047 }

00053 RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::~npConnectionResponse(){
00054   delete data;

00062 void RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::netSerialize(){
00063   if (response==NCR_UNDEFINED){
00064     LOGW("The server's response is not set");
00065   }
00066   data->packetIdentifier=GUINT16_TO_LE(this->id);
00067 
00068   data->response=GUINT16_TO_LE(this->response);
00069 }
00070 
00077 void RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::netDeserialize(){
00078   // Note the explicit cast from integer to enum type ^^
00079   this->id=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tNetPacketIdentifier>
00080     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->packetIdentifier);
00081 
00082   this->response=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tServerConnectionResponse>
00083     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->response);
00084 }
00085 
00091 enet_uint8* RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::getData(){
00092   return data->data;
00093 }
00094 
00100 size_t RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::getDataLength(){
00101   return sizeof(data->data);
00102 }

00110 void RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::
00111 setData(enet_uint8* d, size_t len){
00112   memcpy(data->data, d, len);

00120 void RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::
00121 setResponse(tServerConnectionResponse r){
00122   this->response=r;

00130 RainbruRPG::Network::tServerConnectionResponse 
00131 RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::
00132 getResponse(){

00145 bool RainbruRPG::Network::npConnectionResponse::
00146 responseToBool(tServerConnectionResponse t){
00147   bool ret=false;
00148 
00149   switch(t){
00150   case NCR_UNDEFINED:
00151     ret=false;
00152     break;
00153 
00154   case NCR_REFUSED:
00155     ret=false;
00156     break;
00157 
00158   case NCR_ACCEPTED:
00159     ret=true;
00160     break;
00161   }
00162 
00163   return ret;
00164 }
